text: Leverett A. Saltonstall (September 1, 1892June 17, 1979) was an American lawyer and politician. He was the 55th Governor of Massachusetts, and for more than twenty years as a United States Senator (1945â€“1967). He was the only member of the Republican Senate leadership to vote for the censure of Joseph McCarthy. ==References== Category:1892 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:Lawyers from Massachusetts Category:Governors of Massachusetts Category:United States senators from Massachusetts Category:American military personnel of World War I Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Military people from Massachusetts
title: Leverett Saltonstall
